document.full_text: allyson felix hopes this year's world championships will be a dress rehearsal for a 200m/400m double at the 2012 london olympics, the triple world 200 meters champion said on friday.
document.title: allyson felix planning for olympic double in london
lines_and_colors: allyson felix hopes this year's world championships will be a dress rehearsal for a 200m/400m double at the 2012 london olympics, the triple world 200 meters champion said on friday.
